My name is Michael Rurka. I love design, coding, art, hummus, and Korea.
Primarily interested in projects that contribute to the advancement of humanity. If this is you (or just want to say hi), hit me up: michael@rurkadesign.com

Not on Twitter (sorry @MahdiF ), but you can find me on LinkedIn & Instagram . I'm probably in Montreal, Toronto, or New Brunswick.
